name: Allen LOMAX, Realtor, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney Gen for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, James T. Wynder, Superintendent at S.C.I.D., 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents

parties: Allen LOMAX, Realtor, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney Gen for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, James T. Wynder, Superintendent at S.C.I.D., 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of August, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
932 A.2d 873
Allen LOMAX, Realtor, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney Gen for the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, James T. Wynder, Superintendent at S.C.I.D., 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents.
No. 93 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 31, 2007.
